001package org.example;
002
003public class Start {
004
005  String toBuy = "not set", toSell = "not set";
006
007  public void setToBuy(String toBuy) {
008    this.toBuy = toBuy;
009  }
010  public String getToBuy() {
011    return toBuy;
012  }
013
014
015  public void setToSell(String toSell) {
016    this.toSell = toSell;
017  }
018  public String getToSell() {
019    return toSell;
020  }
021
022
023
024  public void startupInterface(int option) {
025    String eingabe;
026    String exit = "x";
027
028    if(option!=2){
029      System.out.println(toString());
030    }else{System.out.println(toStringEnd());}
031
032    //Interface startup
033    System.out.println();
034    System.out.println("0: Select currency to buy");
035    System.out.println("1: Select currency to sell");
036    System.out.println("2: Choose amount to be converted: ");
037    System.out.println();
038    System.out.println("Please choose an option (>>x<< to exit): ");
039
040
041  }
042  @Override
043  public String toString() {
044    return "Currency to buy: " + getToBuy() + "\n" +
045      "Currency to sell: " + getToSell();
046  }
047  public String toStringEnd(){
048    return "Buying " +getToBuy() +"\n"+
049            "Selling "+getToSell();
050  }
051
052
053
054}
